Uses of Interface
org.fluidity.composition.ComponentContainer

  • Packages that use ComponentContainer 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition
    Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.
    org.fluidity.composition.container
    Service provider interfaces to be used by the dependency injection container implementation.
    org.fluidity.composition.container.spi
    Service provider interfaces to be implemented by the dependency injection container implementation.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer in org.fluidity.composition

      Subinterfaces of ComponentContainer in org.fluidity.composition 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableContainer
      A dependency injection container that components can be added to, using the container's registry.
      interface  ObservedContainer
      A dependency injection container that exposes to application components the static dependencies in a dependency graph without instantiating components, and the dynamic dependencies while resolving and instantiating components.
      interface  OpenContainer
      The external API of a fully populated dependency injection container that that allows dynamic component lookup.
      Classes in org.fluidity.composition that implement ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContainerBoundary
      External access to a class loader specific dependency injection container.
      Methods in org.fluidity.composition that return ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentContainer BoundaryComponent.container()
      Returns the container for this boundary component.
      static ComponentContainer Containers.global()
      Returns the component container populated for the current class loader.
      static ComponentContainer Containers.global(ClassLoader loader)
      Returns the component container populated for the given class loader.
      ComponentContainer ContainerBoundary.intercepting(ComponentInterceptor... interceptors)
      Delegates to the enclosed container.
      ComponentContainer ComponentContainer.intercepting(ComponentInterceptor... interceptors)
      Returns a child container with this one as its parent and with the given component interceptors active, in addition to those found in the class loader ancestry of this container.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer in org.fluidity.composition.container

      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.container that return ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentContainer DependencyInjector.Resolution.container()
      Resolves a ComponentContainer is being depended on.
      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.container that return types with arguments of type ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessGuard<ComponentContainer> DependencyInjector.containerGuard()
      Creates an object that guards against access to a container.
      Method parameters in org.fluidity.composition.container with type arguments of type ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DependencyGraph.Node DependencyInjector.resolve(Class<?> api, AccessGuard<ComponentContainer> guard, DependencyInjector.Resolution resolution)
      Handles the various special and regular dependency types by invokes the appropriate method of the provided resolution object based on the type of the given dependency.

    • Uses of ComponentContainer in org.fluidity.composition.container.spi

      Classes in org.fluidity.composition.container.spi that implement ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmptyComponentContainer<C extends DependencyGraph>
      Implements basic method relationships and functionality on behalf of actual container and registry implementations.
      Methods in org.fluidity.composition.container.spi that return ComponentContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentContainer DependencyResolver.container(ContextDefinition context)
      Returns a new child container with its base context set to the given definition.
      ComponentContainer EmptyComponentContainer.intercepting(ComponentInterceptor... interceptors)
      Returns a child container with this one as its parent and with the given component interceptors active, in addition to those found in the class loader ancestry of this container.
